column4: is it possible and if so could someone point me to a tut or guide to make a karmic .deb work with jaunty ?
What are you trying to accomplish? There may be a better way - and to give a straight answer, whether it's possible depends on the package, so I doubt there's a guide.
there is an app called wiithon a wbfs file manager for linux it only has karmic repos and debs
Have you looked for a ppa in Launchpad?
